pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, December 10, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the third floor foyer of West Block as of 12:00 p.m.

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Nova Scotia, the Honourable Stephen McNeil.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:   

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to gather in the third floor foyer no later than 3:00 p.m.

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Alberta, the Honourable Jason Kenney.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:   

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to gather in the third floor foyer no later than 4:00 p.m.

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will attend the National Liberal Caucus holiday party, and will deliver remarks.

Canada Hall
Shaw Centre
55 Colonel By Drive

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Media should present themselves to the main lobby no later than 6:30 p.m.
